input.options: ANY RED ORANGE YELLOW GREEN BLUE PURPLE PINK BROWN BLACK WHITE GREY
ANY CIRCLE TRIANGLE RECTANGLE PENTAGON HEXAGON HEPTAGON OCTAGON

block.l: var sprite = this, stage = sprite.parentThatIsA(StageMorph), context = stage.penTrails().getContext('2d'), isWarped = sprite.isWarped, img = new Image(), left =0, top = 0; if (isWarped) { sprite.endWarp(); } //img.src = 'http://snap.berkeley.edu/half-snapshot.png'; img.src = 'data:image/png;base64,' + image context.save(); context.scale(1 / stage.scale, 1 / stage.scale); context.translate(left, top); context.rotate((sprite.heading - 90) * Math.PI/180); context.drawImage( img, 0, 0 ); context.restore(); stage.changed(); if (isWarped) { sprite.startWarp(); }
